title: Tile metadata object
description: An object containing the metadata for a single tile

properties.description: The dictionary of properties, conforming to the tile metadata class. `properties` is required if and only if `tileset.extensions.3DTILES_metadata.tile.class` is defined. Properties are defined using the single instance shorthand

builtinProperties.description: A dictionary of properties, conforming to the additional properties listed in `tileset.extensions.3DTILES_metadata.tile.additionalProperties`. `additionalProperties` is required if and only if `tileset.extensions.3DTILES_metadata.tile.additionalProperties`. Additional properties are defined with the single instance shorthands
